explains: adj. 不利的，有害的；相反的；敌对的
wordGroup: adverse effect 不利影响；副作用
adverse selection 逆选择；相反的选择
adverse reaction 不良反应；逆反应；有害反应
adverse weather 恶劣天气；不利天气
adverse factor 有害因素；有害因子
adverse condition 不利条件；有害状态
adverse balance of trade 逆差；贸易逆差
adverse criticism 反向批评；逆向评论

sentences.en: This drug is known to have adverse side effects.
sentences.cn: 众所周知，这种药具有不良副作用。

sentences.en: The improper use of medicine could lead to severe adverse reactions.
sentences.cn: 用药不当会引起严重的不良反应。

sentences.en: Lack of money will have an adverse effect on our research programme.
sentences.cn: 缺少资金将对我们的研究方案有不利影响。
